Hey All, question for expert. Is is possible to scrape UTM from HubSpot Chat. According to HubSpot documentation and community form at the moment it's not possible..
Technically I think you could use the conversations api to pull in all the messages but scraping is another things
Scraping is definitely possible (w/ JS) but I wouldn't really advise it
Here's a link to the conversations api <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/conversations>
Hi  everyone , please someone can help me
I receive this error when I load my website page

<@U0210926MN2> <@UBT0AHWLD> I had this one time, it was with a mobile browser, disabled JavaScript and an Image CTA without ALT-Text. The Browser was trying to request the original file source, not the optimized image source set that HubSpot create for the CTA. And those original file format was WebP, which was not supported by the client browser. So we changed it to PNG and add an Alternate Text to fix it.
